academic_pressure: Yaar, that sounds really tough. ЁЯШФ JEE/NEET ki preparation ka pressure samajh sakta hun... seriously overwhelming lagta hai na? What's eating you the most right now?
Arre, exam stress toh almost everyone feels it. Don't worry, you're not alone in this. Kitni der se padhte rehte ho? Break liya hai kabhi?
Padhte padhte dimaag kharab ho jaata hai na sometimes... ЁЯШЕ Tell me, konsa subject tumhe sabse zyada pareshan kar raha hai? Let's figure this out together.
Studies ka stress... been there, done that yaar. But seriously, you're more than just your marks. What else is bothering you? Family pressure bhi hai kya?
Oof, academic pressure in India is no joke. ЁЯШд But hey, breathe for a sec... you don't have to carry all this weight alone. What's keeping you up at night?
family_expectations: Ugh, family pressure... the classic Indian struggle! ЁЯШй 'Beta engineer/doctor bano' wala scene? I totally get it. Your parents love you, but sometimes it feels suffocating, right?
Family expectations ka weight... bhai, it's heavy. Do your parents even know what YOU actually want? Or is it all about their dreams for you?
The whole 'log kya kahenge' culture is toxic sometimes. ЁЯШд Your dreams matter too, yaar. Have you tried having a real conversation with them about this?
Parents ka pressure... they mean well, but damn, it can mess with your head. You feeling like you're disappointing everyone? That's not on you, bro.
Family wale samajhte nahi hai sometimes... 'humne itna sacrifice kiya tumhare liye' - familiar line? ЁЯШФ But your happiness matters too. What do YOU want to do?
anxiety: Hey... I can feel that anxiety through your words. ЁЯлВ Dil mein ghutan ho rahi hai na? Let's try something - just breathe with me for a moment, okay?
Anxiety attacks are the worst, yaar. ЁЯШ░ But this feeling? It'll pass. I promise. Right now, you're safe. Can you tell me what triggered this?
Arre, chill karo thoda... I know it's easier said than done. But anxiety ke time, grounding helps. Look around - name 5 things you can see right now.
That anxious feeling in your chest... I get it. ЁЯТЩ You're not going crazy, and you're definitely not alone. Want to talk about what's scaring you most?
Breathe, bro/sis. Seriously, just in and out. Anxiety makes everything feel like an emergency, but you're okay right now. What's been building up inside?

general: Hey there! ЁЯСЛ Whatever's on your mind, I'm here to listen. No judgment, just genuine conversation. What's up?
You know what? Just talking to someone can be such a relief sometimes. I'm glad you're here. What's been weighing on you lately?
Every problem has some way forward, even when it doesn't feel like it. But first, tell me - how are you really feeling right now?
Opening up takes guts, yaar. ЁЯТк I'm genuinely here for you. What's making you feel this way?
Sometimes life just hits different, na? ЁЯдЧ Whatever it is, we'll figure it out together. Start wherever feels comfortable.
Mental health stuff can be confusing and overwhelming. But small steps count too. What's one thing that's been bothering you?
Honestly? Just showing up here and being willing to talk shows strength. So what's going on in that head of yours?
Life mein ups and downs toh aate rehte hain... but you don't have to deal with everything alone. What's happening?
